info.title: Oracle Database
info.description: Oracle Database is a relational database management system developed by Oracle. Connect to on-premise Oracle Database to perform various actions such as create, update, get, and delete on rows in a table.

post.summary: Get pass-through native Oracle query metadata
post.description: Retrieves metadata for a pass-through native Oracle query.

get.description: This operation gets metadata for a stored procedure.
This operation gets metadata for a stored procedure.
This operation gets metadata for a table.
This operation gets all datasets available to the connection.
This operation gets stored procedures for a database.
This operation gets stored procedures for a database.

post.description: This operation runs a stored procedure.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Input parameters to the stored procedure

post.description: This operation runs a stored procedure.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Input parameters to the stored procedure

get.summary: GetTables with OData paging and filtering
get.description: GetTables with OData paging and filtering

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: An ODATA filter query to restrict the entries returned (e.g. stringColumn eq 'string' OR numberColumn lt 123).

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: An ODATA orderBy query for specifying the order of entries.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Total number of entries to retrieve (default = all).

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: The number of entries to skip (default = 0).

get.description: This operation gets tables from a database.
This operation gets rows from a table.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: An ODATA filter query to restrict the entries returned (e.g. stringColumn eq 'string' OR numberColumn lt 123).

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: An ODATA orderBy query for specifying the order of entries.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Total number of entries to retrieve (default = all).

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: The number of entries to skip (default = 0).

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Specific fields to retrieve from entries (default = all).

post.description: This operation inserts a new row into a table.

parameters.name: item
parameters.description: Row to insert into the specified table

get.description: This operation gets a row from a table.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the row to retrieve

delete.description: This operation deletes a row from a table.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the row to delete

patch.description: This operation updates an existing row in a table.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the row to update

parameters.description: An ODATA filter query to restrict the entries returned (e.g. stringColumn eq 'string' OR numberColumn lt 123).

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: An ODATA orderBy query for specifying the order of entries.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Total number of entries to retrieve (default = all).

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: The number of entries to skip (default = 0).

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Specific fields to retrieve from entries (default = all).

get.description: This operation gets a row from a table.

parameters.description: Unique identifier of the row to retrieve

delete.description: This operation deletes a row from a table.

PassThroughNativeQueryBody.description: Input body to execute Pass-through Native Query (PNQ)

PassThroughNativeQueryMetadata.description: Represents the metadata for a pass-through native query

serverPagingOptions.description: List of supported server-driven paging capabilities

sortable.description: Indicates whether this table has sortable columns

ascendingOnlyProperties.description: List of properties which support ascending order only

filterable.description: Indicates whether this table has filterable columns

selectable.description: Indicates whether this table has selectable columns

Name.description: The name of the table. The name is used at runtime.

DisplayName.description: The display name of the table.

DynamicProperties.description: Additional table properties provided by the connector to the clients.

PassThroughNativeQuery.description: static schema for pass-through native query execution

OutputParameters.description: Output parameter values. The schema is dynamic based on the procedure.

ResultSets.description: Result sets returned by a procedure. The schema is dynamic based on the procedure.
